revised_title: The Impact of World Wars on Science in the United Kingdom
tldr: This article discusses the effects of the two world wars on the organization and development of science in the United Kingdom. It highlights how the wars led to increased involvement of scientists in military efforts and the subsequent changes in the role of science in public life. The article also touches upon the impact of the wars on scientific research, education, and the allocation of scientists in various fields.
